concept.title: Logging and tracing on the Sametime Embedded and Connect Clients
concept.shortdesc: You can provide these instructions to Sametime Embedded and Connect Client users to enable tracing on their clients. Trace logs are stored in a workspace folder on the user's local hard drive or a network drive.

ol.li: Locate the client workspace as explained in Locating the client workspace.

On the computer where you use the client, use a text editor and open the rcpinstall.properties file which is located in the following directory according to the client:
Sametime Connect Client
C:\Users\user_name\AppData\Roaming\HCL\Sametime\.config\rcpinstall.properties
Sametime Embedded Client
C:\Program Files\HCL\Notes\Data\workspace\.config\rcpinstall.properties

Add the following lines to the end of the file, depending on what kind of issue you're diagnosing.
General client issues: com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.level=FINE
Telephony and audio/video issues, including Sametime Unified Telephony and Meetings:
General issues: com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.internal.telephony.level=FINE com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.telephony.level=FINE com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.telephony.tcspi.level=FINEST com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.telephony.softphone.level=FINER com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.telephony.softphone.mfw.level=FINER
Audio/video quality issues:com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.internal.telephony.level=FINE com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.telephony.level=FINE com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.telephony.softphone.level=FINER com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.telephony.softphone.mfw.level=FINER
Instant messaging issues: com.lotus.sametime.community.kernel.level=FINER com.lotus.sametime.im.level=FINEST com.lotus.sametime.places.level=FINEST com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.rtcadapter.level=FINEST com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.people.internal.level=FINE com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.internal.sametime.level=FINER com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.login.level=FINEST com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.community.internal.level=FINEST
Login issues:
General login failures: com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.community.internal.level=FINEST com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.im.community.level=FINEST org.apache.commons.httpclient.level=FINE com.hcl.rcp.internal.security.auth.module.level=FINEST com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.login.level=FINEST com.lotus.sametime.community.level=FINEST
SSO failures: com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.community.internal.level=FINEST com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.im.community.level=FINEST org.apache.commons.httpclient.level=FINE com.hcl.rcp.internal.security.auth.module.level=FINEST com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.login.level=FINEST com.lotus.sametime.community.level=FINEST com.hcl.rcp.internal.security.level=FINEST com.hcl.rcp.security.level=FINEST
Managed settings: com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.policy.sametime.managedsettings.level=FINEST
Meetings:
General meeting issues: com.hcl.rtc.meetings.level=FINER com.hcl.rtc.spaces.level=FINER com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.appshare.level=FINER com.hcl.rtccore.level=FINER com.hcl.sharedmaps.level=FINER
Calendar integration issues:com.hcl.rtc.meetings.servers.level=FINEST com.hcl.rtc.meetings.shelf.level=FINEST com.hcl.rtc.meetings.shelf.ui.level=FINEST com.hcl.rtc.meetings.util.level=FINEST com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.calendar.level=FINER com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.calendar.notes.level=FINEST
Connectivity issues:com.hcl.rtccore.level=FINEST com.hcl.rtc.spaces.level=FINER
Screen sharing issues: com.hcl.rtc.meetings.appshare.level=FINER com.hcl.collaboration.realtime.appshare.level=FINER
Document sharing/conversion issues: com.hcl.rtc.meetings.documents.level=FINER com.hcl.rtc.meetings.appkit.image.level=FINER com.hcl.workplace.converter.level=FINER
(Optional) Prevent more of the log and trace files from being overwritten by increasing the values of the following settings from the default to a larger number:com.hcl.rcp.core.internal.logger.boot.RCPTraceHandler.count=20 com.hcl.rcp.core.internal.logger.boot.RCPLogHandler.count=12
The default settings save 12 trace files and 6 log files (Connect client) or 10 trace files and 6 log files (Embedded client). In this example, we are saving 20 trace files and 12 log files for the Connect client.

View the error log and trace files in the Connect Client, by clicking HelpSupportView Log and View Trace.
In most cases, View Trace provides the most useful information.

(Optional) You can collect logs and other data into a zip file and provide it to someone else for diagnostics.
In the Notes embedded client, click Help Support Collect Support Data .
In the stand-alone Connect Client, click
gear icon
Help Support Collect Support Data .
Select Enable Customized Tracing, and then click Next.
Select one or more Sametime options, and then click Next.
Specify if you want to reproduce the issue, and then click Collect. When the collection completes, a link to the collection zip file is provided.
